member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.OutputImage
member.summary: Gets the linescan distortion corrected output image.
member.value: The linescan distortion corrected output image.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional region whose pixel aligned bounding box specifies a portion of the input image to be used during linescan distortion correction.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.InputImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the input image that is to be linescan distortion corrected.
member.value: The image to be linescan distortion corrected.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.Operator
member.summary: Gets or sets the CogLinescanDistortionCorrection operator used by this tool.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.LastRunRecordDiagEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionLastRunRecordDiagConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionLastRunRecordDiagConstants. Options include None, InputImageByReference, InputImageDeepCopy, Region, TrainImageDeepCopy, TrainRegion, TrainXSpan, and All.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.LastRunRecordEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionLastRunRecordConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionLastRunRecordConstants. Options include None, OutputImage, and All.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.CurrentRecordEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionCurrentRecordConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionCurrentRecordConstants. Options include None, TrainImage, TrainRegion, InputImage, Region, and All.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by OutputImage may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by InputImage may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Operator may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool.SfCurrentRecordEnable
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by CurrentRecordEnable may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by LastRunRecordDiagEnable may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTool
member.summary:
This class provides tool level access to the
operator. This class encapsulates all of the classes needed to perform linescan distortion correction.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.Execute(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage,Cognex.VisionPro.ICogRegion)
member.summary: Process the supplied input image to produce a linescan distortion corrected output image.
member.param: The image to be processed. Must be of type CogImage8Grey.
An optional region of interest. If provided, the pixel aligned bounding box of this region specifies which input pixels should be used.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.Train
member.summary: Train this operator. If this operator is already trained then no work is done. When training in Positions mode it is a requirement that the internal list of train positions be in ascending or increasing order.
member.exception: If TrainMode is Image and TrainImage is null.
If TrainMode is Positions and there are fewer than 4 train positions defined.
If TrainMode is Positions and the defined train positions are not in increasing order.
If TrainMode is Positions and any of the defined train positions fall outside of the train X span.
If TrainMode is Image and the TrainImage has too few features.
If TrainMode is Image and the TrainImage does not appear to have the required vertical stripes.
If TrainMode is Image and the TrainImage is not CogImage8Grey.
member.event: Fires when this method causes the Trained property to become true.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.ClearTrainPositions
member.summary: Remove all train positions from this operator.
member.event: Fires when this method removes one or more train positions.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.DeleteTrainPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the train position at the specified index. Deleting a train position will cause the operator to untrain.
member.param: The zero-based index of the no longer desired train position value.
member.exception: If Index is less than 0 or Index is greater than or equal to NumTrainPositions.
member.event: Fires when this method deletes an existing train position.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.AddTrainPosition(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Add the specified train position. If an Index is supplied then the new position is inserted at that location. If no Index is supplied, or if an Index with the special value -1 is supplied, then the new train position is appended to the end of the internal list of train positions. Adding a train position will cause the operator to untrain. When training in Positions mode it is a requirement that the internal list of train positions be in ascending or increasing order.
member.param: The optional zero-based index of the desired train position value. An Index of -1 means add to the end of the list. An Index equal to NumTrainPositions means add to the end of the list.
The pixel space X coordinate value for the new position.
member.exception: If Index is less than -1 or Index is greater than NumTrainPositions.
member.event: Fires when this method adds a new train position.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.SetTrainPosition(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Set the specified train position value. Changing a train position value will cause the operator to untrain. When training in Positions mode it is a requirement that the internal list of train positions be in ascending or increasing order.
member.param: The zero-based index of the desired train position value.
The new pixel space X coordinate value for the position at this index.
member.exception: If Index is less than zero or Index is greater than or equal to NumTrainPositions.
member.event: Fires when this method changes the existing train position value.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.GetTrainPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the specified train position value.
member.returns: The desired train position in pixel space X coordinates.
member.param: The zero-based index of the desired train position value.
member.exception: If Index is less than zero or Index is greater than or equal to NumTrainPositions.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.NumTrainPositions
member.summary: Gets the number of train positions.
member.value: The currently defined number of train positions.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.TrainXSpanSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the X span size.
member.value: The size, in pixels, of the train X span. When TrainMode is Image, this value is computed and updated by the Train method. When TrainMode is Positions, this value is used as an input by the Train method. Changing this value causes the operator to untrain, regardless of TrainMode.
member.exception: If the supplied argument is not greater than zero.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.TrainXSpanOrigin
member.summary: Gets or sets the TrainXSpanOrigin.
member.value: The origin, in pixels, of the train X span. When TrainMode is Image, this value is computed and updated by the Train method. When TrainMode is Positions, this value is used as an input by the Train method. Changing this value causes the operator to untrain, regardless of TrainMode.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.TrainRegion
member.summary: Gets or sets the train region.
member.value: An optional region that defines the subset of the TrainImage to be used during training when TrainMode is Image. This region is used to define a pixel aligned bounding box within the TrainImage. This property is ignored if TrainMode is not Image. Changing this value, or a geometrical (not graphical) attribute of this region, causes the operator to untrain, regardless of TrainMode.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.TrainImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the train image.
member.value: The image used to train this operator when TrainMode is Image. This property is ignored if TrainMode is not Image. Changing this value causes the operator to untrain, regardless of TrainMode.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.TrainMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the train mode.
member.value: The train mode. May be either Image or Positions. Default is Image. Changing this value causes the operator to untrain.
member.exception: If the supplied argument is not either Image or Positions.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.Trained
member.summary: Gets the Trained flag for this operator.
member.value: Whether or not this operator is trained.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Serializer for CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object.

member.summary: Serialization constructor for CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object.

member.summary: Perform post-deserialization setup.

member.summary: Finalize this CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object.

member.summary: Destruct this CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object.

member.summary: Construct a deep copy of the supplied CogLinescanDistortionCorrection
member.param: The CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object to be copied. May not be null.
member.exception: If the input argument is null.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrection.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a default CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object. This will initially have no train positions.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by TrainXSpanSize may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by TrainXSpanOrigin may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by NumTrainPositions may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by TrainRegion may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by TrainImage may have changed.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by TrainMode may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionInputImageDoesNotContainXSpanException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the input image does not contain the train X span.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainImageNotStripedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the train image does not appear to have the required vertical stripes.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainImageHasTooFewFeaturesException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the train image has too few featuers.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionExtrapolatedPositionsDoNotFillXSpanException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the X span is not filled by extrapolated positions.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTooFewTrainPositionsException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown during training when there are fewer than 4 defined train positions.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainPositionOutsideXSpanException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown during training when a train position falls outside the train X span.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainPositionsNotInIncreasingOrderException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown during training when TrainMode is Positions and the defined train positions are not in increasing order.

member.summary: Include all of the diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.summary: Include a copy of the region in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainModeConstants
member.summary: Constants used to specify how to train a CogLinescanDistortionCorrection object.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainModeConstants.Positions
member.summary: Use TrainXSpanOrigin, TrainXSpanSize, and the train positions described by NumTrainPositions and the GetTrainPosition method as the basis for training.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.LinescanDistortionCorrection.CogLinescanDistortionCorrectionTrainModeConstants.Image
member.summary: Use TrainImage, and optionally TrainRegion, as the basis for training.
